# Draft:Battle of Rusçuk (1811)

Russian Empire
| combatant2        =  Ottoman Empire
| commander1        = Mikhail KutuzovYevgeny Markov
| commander2        = Ahmed Pasha
| strength1         = 15,000–20,000 soldiers
| strength2         = 60,000 soldiers78 cannon
| casualties1       = 800
| casualties2       = 3,500–5,000
}}
The Battle of Rusçuk was a battle that took place on 22 of June, 1811 between the invading Russian troops led by Mikhail Kutuzov and the Ottoman army as a part of the ongoing Russo-Turkish war. The battle ended in a Russian victory and became a pretext for the upcoming battle of Slobozia.
